email.description: The email address of the user, used for login and notifications.

groups.description:
The groups for the user.
 Format: groups/{email}

mfaEnabled.description: The mfa_enabled flag means if the user has enabled MFA.

name.description:
The name of the user.
 Format: users/{user}. {user} is a system-generated unique ID.

password.description: The password for authentication. Only used during user creation or password updates.

phone.description:
Should be a valid E.164 compliant phone number.
 Could be empty.

serviceKey.description: The service key for service account authentication. Only used for service accounts.

state.description: The lifecycle state of the user account.
state.title: State

tempOtpSecret.description: Temporary OTP secret used during MFA setup and regeneration.

tempOtpSecretCreatedTime.description: Timestamp when temp_otp_secret was created. Used by frontend to show countdown timer.

tempRecoveryCodes.description: Temporary recovery codes used during MFA setup and regeneration.

title.description: The display title or full name of the user.
